statements: SELECT * FROM financial_data
SELECT transaction_id, description, amount, date FROM financial_data
SELECT description, amount FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT transaction_id, description, amount FROM financial_data ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT description, amount FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE description LIKE '%payment%' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, date, description, amount FROM financial_data WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM financial_data;
SELECT * FROM FinancialData;
SELECT id, amount, category FROM FinancialData WHERE category = 'Food';
SELECT id, amount FROM FinancialData WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, category FROM FinancialData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM AuditLogs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM FinancialData WHERE id = 1
SELECT amount, category FROM FinancialData WHERE date >= '2021-01-01' AND amount > 1000
SELECT id, category, amount FROM FinancialData WHERE category = 'Income' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT log_date, action, user_id FROM AuditLogs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM AuditLogs WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY log_date DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT amount, category FROM financial_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, timestamp, amount FROM financial_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT role_name, permissions FROM auditor_roles;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, amount, category FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT log_id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM auditor_roles WHERE permissions LIKE '%read%' ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers;
SELECT policymaker_id, name, position FROM PolicyMakers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Audits WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policymaker_id, COUNT(*) AS audit_count FROM Audits GROUP BY policymaker_id;
SELECT * FROM FinancialData f JOIN Audits a ON f.audit_id = a.audit_id WHERE f.financial_year = 2022;
SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers WHERE organization = 'Company A';
SELECT policymaker_id, name, position FROM PolicyMakers ORDER BY policymaker_id DESC;
SELECT a.audit_id, a.audit_date, p.name, f.financial_year FROM Audits a JOIN PolicyMakers p ON a.policymaker_id = p.policymaker_id JOIN FinancialData f ON a.audit_id = f.audit_id;
SELECT * FROM Audits WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT ar.record_id, a.audit_date, ar.record_type, ar.record_details FROM AuditRecords ar JOIN Audits a ON ar.audit_id = a.audit_id WHERE ar.record_type = 'Violation';
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT company_name, financial_statement FROM financial_data WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_details ORDER BY audit_rating DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM user WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT auditor_name, auditor_email, auditor_phone FROM auditor WHERE auditor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY audit_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT audit_id, company_name, financial_statement FROM financial_data WHERE audit_date >= '2021-01-01' AND audit_date <= '2021-12-31';

SELECT auditor.auditor_name, audit_details.audit_rating, financial_data.company_name FROM auditor JOIN audit_details ON auditor.auditor_id = audit_details.auditor_id JOIN financial_data ON audit_details.audit_id = financial_data.audit_id WHERE audit_details.audit_rating = 'Excellent';
SELECT audit_logs.*, user.user_name FROM audit_logs JOIN user ON audit_logs.user_id = user.user_id ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT financial_data.audit_id, financial_data.company_name, audit_details.audit_rating, audit_details.audit_comments FROM financial_data JOIN audit_details ON financial_data.audit_id = audit_details.audit_id WHERE audit_details.audit_rating = 'Good' ORDER BY financial_data.audit_id ASC LIMIT 10;
